items.title: The Most Hearted Of 2019
items.description: The most popular Pens from the year 2019 of Codepen. Definitely worth checking out.

items.title: V 8.0 Release
items.description: V8 is Google’s open source high-performance JavaScript and WebAssembly engine. It is used in Chrome and in Node.js, among others.

items.title: lazy-simon.js
items.description: A tiny JavaScript library to lazy load all on your website, by Simon Frey.

items.title: Top GitHub Apps You Should Know About
items.description: A few, effective GitHub apps for your workflow.

items.title: What Is JavaScript Made Of?
items.description: An interesting read by Dan Abramov about the details of Javascript.

items.title: Replacing Redux with observables and React Hooks
items.description: A good read how (and why) Simon Trény got rid of Redux with observables and React Hooks.
